batch.title: [BATCH] About Batch Processing
batch.description:
Automatically analyze large numbers of image pairs (300+ images) and determine statistically valid thresholds.
Ideal for medical image research and AI model comparison.
batch.original_folder_label: [FOLDER] Original Image Folder (Required ‚Ä¢ Before processing ‚Ä¢ PNG recommended)
batch.append_mode_label: Append data to existing CSV (unchecked = overwrite mode)
batch.limit_note: ‚Äª 0 = process all images, 10 = process first 10 only (for testing)
batch.parallel_info: [PARALLEL] Parallel Processing Settings (Effective for 1000+ images; slower for small batches)
batch.patch_size_desc: For large batches, 16√ó16 (standard) is recommended; for medical images, select 8√ó8
batch.stats_desc: After batch processing, statistically analyze the CSV file to generate 25 types of research plots.
batch.error_invalid_scale: Please specify a downscale factor greater than 0 and less than 1
batch.error_scale_not_number: Please specify downscale factor as a number

batch_analyzer.jpg_lossy_warning: JPEG is a lossy compression format and image quality is already degraded.
batch_analyzer.jpg_recommend_png: For accurate evaluation, strongly recommend re-exporting from original data in PNG format.
batch_analyzer.jpg_problem_2: - Loss of high-frequency components (fine details lost)
batch_analyzer.jpg_action_1: 1. Re-export in PNG format from original software/camera
batch_analyzer.jpg_action_2: 2. Convert from lossless formats like TIFF
batch_analyzer.jpg_action_3: 3. Always use PNG format for medical use and paper publication
batch_analyzer.info_limit_mode: [INFO] Split execution mode: Processing only first {limit} images
batch_analyzer.warning_upscaled_jpg: [WARNING] JPEG files detected in super-resolution results
batch_analyzer.jpg_cannot_evaluate: JPEG lossy compression prevents accurate AI processing quality evaluation.
batch_analyzer.jpg_recommend_reexport: Strongly recommend re-exporting in PNG format from original AI super-resolution tool.

errors.no_models: Please select at least one model folder

patterns.P1: P1: High SSIM √ó Low PSNR (Structure preserved, frequency loss)
patterns.P3: P3: High Edge √ó Low Quality (Edge enhancement, internal degradation)
patterns.P5: P5: High Freq √ó Low Texture (False detail generation)
patterns.P6: P6: High Quality Variance (Localized processing failure)
patterns.P7: P7: Low Entropy √ó High Freq (Information deficit)
patterns.P8: P8: Abnormal Contrast √ó Low Hist Corr (Color distortion)
patterns.P9: P9: Low MS-SSIM √ó Low Total (Multi-scale degradation)

help.workflow_step2: 2. Upscale downscaled image (LR: 500√ó500px) by 2√ó using AI SR
help.common_mistake: ‚ùå Common mistake: Setting downscaled as GT and original as SR

academic.title: [ACAD] About Academic Benchmark Evaluation
academic.description:
Create reference images with standard bicubic downscaling for fair comparison with existing research.
Evaluate super-resolution models quantitatively on large datasets (15,000 images recommended) and generate data for paper submission.
academic.workflow_steps:
Step 1: Prepare high-resolution images (15,000 recommended)
Step 2: Configure original image and SR model folders
Step 3: Start batch processing (several hours to 1 day)
Step 4: Generate statistics analysis and 25 plots ‚≠ê Required
Step 5: Check detection_count (26 patterns) ‚Üí Use for deep learning
academic.bicubic_desc:
Batch generate low-resolution LR images from high-resolution GT images (for √ó2 SR evaluation).
Skippable if you already have LR images.
academic.mode_info: [STATS] Evaluation Mode: Academic Evaluation Mode (Bicubic downscaling, √ó2 scale standard evaluation)
academic.original_folder_required: [FOLDER] Original Image Folder (Required ‚Ä¢ High-res images ‚Ä¢ PNG recommended)
academic.parallel_info: [PARALLEL] Parallel Processing Settings (Recommended for 15,000 images; slower for small batches)
academic.patch_size_desc: For paper quality, 16√ó16 (standard) or 8√ó8 (ultra-high precision) recommended
academic.patch_8x8: 8√ó8 (Ultra-high precision, for medical images and top-quality papers)
academic.stats_warning:
[WARNING] After batch processing, you MUST run this statistical analysis.
26-pattern hallucination detection and detection_count will be generated.
This detection_count becomes the label for deep learning!
academic.select_original_folder: Select Original Image Folder (High-res images, 15,000 recommended)
